FuncDef:
The virtual-channel command configures a ring auto protection switching protocol data unit (R-APS PDU) transmission mode for a sub-ring.
The undo virtual-channel enable command restores the default configuration. The virtual-channel command configures a ring auto protection switching protocol data unit (R-APS PDU) transmission mode for a sub-ring. The undo virtual-channel enable command restores the default configuration. By default, R-APS PDUs on sub-rings are transmitted in non-virtual channel (NVC) mode. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K and CE6820S.

ParaDef.Info:
Disables the VC mode for R-APS PDU transmission on a sub-ring, which means the NVC mode is used.
-

Enables the VC mode for R-APS PDU transmission on a sub-ring.
-
